title: How to Make a Hormel Spam Salad

steps.headline: Boil the eggs.
steps.description: Hard boiled eggs will be easier to cube than soft boiled.

steps.headline: Peel the cucumbers.
steps.description: Take the shells off the boils eggs. Open the tin of Spam and take out the meat product.

steps.headline: Dice the Hormel Spam, tomatoes, eggs, and cucumbers - about half inch to one inch (1-2.5cm) chunks will do.
steps.description: Keeping everything about the same size will make a neat, tidy looking salad.

steps.headline: Place all the diced ingredients in a large bowl.
Drizzle salad dressing in the bowl and mix.
steps.description: The amount of dressing is a matter of taste. Be careful - more dressing may make the dish more soggier in a faster time. Use mayonnaise, honey and mustard dressing, yogurt and mint dressing, anything you like.

steps.headline: Season by adding salt and pepper to taste..
Serve individual portions on dinner plates accompanied by slices of fresh bread or bread rolls.

text: Assemble the ingredients listed above. Wash the cucumbers and tomatoes. Boil the eggs. Hard boiled eggs will be easier to cube than soft boiled. Peel the cucumbers. Take the shells off the boils eggs. Open the tin of Spam and take out the meat product. Dice the Hormel Spam, tomatoes, eggs, and cucumbers - about half inch to one inch (1-2.5cm) chunks will do. Keeping everything about the same size will make a neat, tidy looking salad. Place all the diced ingredients in a large bowl.  Drizzle salad dressing in the bowl and mix. The amount of dressing is a matter of taste. Be careful - more dressing may make the dish more soggier in a faster time. Use mayonnaise, honey and mustard dressing, yogurt and mint dressing, anything you like. Season by adding salt and pepper to taste..  Serve individual portions on dinner plates accompanied by slices of fresh bread or bread rolls.
